title: NEWS FLASH: DYANA WEISSMAN GRACES THE COVER OF THE NEW YORK TIMES
content:
![Birthday](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113202952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/68567.jpg)   
   
Dyana, you are definitely not yesterday's news. Someone in your office sent the scoop to me and I had to stop the presses to make this happen. :^D Happiest of Birthdays!!

 [‹ Fleischmann & Plantin Nonpareil](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113202952/http:/www.typophile.com/node/9902 "Go to previous forum topic") [Gill Sans and Joanna ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113202952/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10112 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content:
Shame on NYT, they use a Sanserif ;)   
   
   
   
   
Meanwhile, bon anniversaire!

Happy birthday, Dyana! Will there be dancing this evening?   
   
See you in New York.
Dyana Weissman is my favorite of the many Nobel type designers.

Awww, thanks guys! Someone at FB is in deep trouble when I find out who they are. And thanks for not making any "you must be a joke" jokes.   
   
There will indeed be dancing, and lots of it.

Happy Birthday, Dyana..   
   
_( My lil' sister also shares your date of birth, on April, 1st, so she may second your 'Noo, Thanks, No Joking' remark.. )_
Sorry I'm a day late, Dyana. Hope you had a good one. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080113202952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
Hi, I'm 2 days late, but I was thinking happy birthday thoughts on time
